name: The Law Office of Robert E. Price Reviews

review.title: “Legal assistant to Robert E. Price”
review.pros: Pros – Somewhat flexible on working hours, understands the need to maintain a good balance of work/home life. Mr. Price strives to be fair and helpful.
review.cons: Cons – The only cons I can think of are not specific to this employer; sometimes people calling the office do not speak clearly on the phone, for example.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Your organizational system is great. Keep up the good work!
